description: Evaluation questions for rholang - Cargo workspace with compiler/interpreter, proc-macros, and C FFI

questions.name: workspace_crate_count
questions.question: How many crates are in the Cargo workspace? (Provide the count)

questions.name: project_version
questions.question: What is the workspace version defined in the root Cargo.toml? (Provide the version string)

questions.name: rust_edition
questions.question: What Rust edition is used in this workspace? (Provide the edition year)

questions.name: tier0_count
questions.question: How many Tier 0 (foundation) crates are there? (Provide the count)

questions.name: executable_count
questions.question: How many executable (bin) crates are in this workspace? (Provide the count)

questions.name: proc_macro_crate
questions.question: What is the name of the procedural macro crate? (Provide the crate name)

questions.name: ffi_crate
questions.question: What is the name of the FFI bridge crate? (Provide the crate name)

questions.name: c_source_files
questions.question: How many .c (C source) files are in the repository? (Provide the count)

questions.name: main_cli_crate
questions.question: What is the name of the main compiler CLI executable crate? (Provide the crate name)

questions.name: build_script_crate
questions.question: Which crate has a build.rs build script? (Provide the crate name)

questions.name: common_types_dependencies
questions.question: What external crates does common-types depend on? (Provide a list)

questions.name: parser_dependencies
questions.question: What workspace crates does parser directly depend on? (Provide a list of crate names)

questions.name: ffi_bridge_type
questions.question: What type of library is ffi-bridge? (Answer 'static', 'shared', or 'both')

questions.name: codegen_count
questions.question: How many code generation backend crates are there? (Provide the count)

questions.name: codegen_backends
questions.question: What are the names of the code generation backend crates? (Provide a list)

questions.name: vm_runtime_dependencies
questions.question: What workspace crates does vm-runtime directly depend on? (Provide a list)

questions.name: test_frameworks
questions.question: What test frameworks are used in this repository? (Provide a list)

questions.name: benchmark_crate
questions.question: What is the name of the benchmark suite crate? (Provide the crate name)

questions.name: aggregator_count
questions.question: How many aggregators are defined in this workspace? (Provide the count)

questions.name: total_external_packages
questions.question: How many unique external crates (from crates.io) are used across the workspace? (Provide the count)

questions.name: max_dependency_depth
questions.question: What is the maximum dependency depth in this repository? (Provide a number)

questions.name: build_order_tier0
questions.question: Which crates must be built first (Tier 0, no workspace dependencies)? (Provide a list)

questions.name: cascade_failure_common_types
questions.question: If common-types fails to build, how many other crates would also fail? (Provide the count)

questions.name: parallel_build_codegen
questions.question: Can codegen-c and codegen-bytecode be built in parallel? (Answer yes or no)

questions.name: integration_tests_dependencies
questions.question: What are the direct workspace dependencies of integration-tests? (Provide a list)

questions.name: ffi_c_header
questions.question: What is the name of the C header file in the ffi-bridge crate? (Provide the filename)

questions.name: cross_language_dependencies
questions.question: Does this repository have cross-language dependencies? (Answer yes or no)

questions.name: depth_5_components
questions.question: Which components are at dependency depth 5? (Provide a list)

questions.name: proc_macro_dependencies
questions.question: What external crates does rholang-macros depend on? (Provide a list)

questions.name: language_count
questions.question: How many different programming languages are used in this repository? (Provide the count)
